name: Enjoying Hanoi Life in the local way
description:
Hanoi is always "different" to the other cities of Vietnam because this is not only the capital - the centre of politics, enconomy and culture of the country, but also the millennial ancient city with many special traditions and dishes.
Let me tell you the legends of Sword Lake and West Lake beside a cup of coffee in Vietnamese way.
Let me show you small dramatic roads and specific food dishes such as Pho, Bun Thang, ect by a walk around the Old Quarter Hanoi.
Let's experience the Hanoi life in all of its aspect, all right?
We have just one day to enjoy it.
